name: 3 Emilie (Lorange Journey DLC)
description:
A DLC for 4 Alice: Lorange Journey.

A One-Shot about a girl named Emilie who wants to tell YOU her story. 

A Twine story with 3 endings.

-----------------

  • You can toogle fullscreen with the ENTER key.
  • Choice of fonts, text size and background colors in the Settings menu! You can change the language there too.

Also, if you post about it on social media, please use the #3Emilie hashtag. Thanks.
